WEFT 90.1 fm

listener-supported, volunteer operated, community radio since 1981

Community Partners

WEFT is grateful for the local businesses and organizations that support the programming on the station. If your business is interested in becoming a Community Partner and a supporting a program on WEFT, contact our Community Partners Coordinator, at communitypartners@weft.org, or call WEFT at 217-359-9338.
